name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-copilot-prompt-gallery
title: PnP Copilot Prompt Gallery
shortDescription: This solution displays a gallery of Copilot prompts from the PnP copilot-prompts repository and allows users to easily copy prompts for reuse.
longDescription: This solution displays a gallery of Copilot prompts from the PnP copilot-prompts repository and allows users to easily copy prompts for reuse.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
